mapper.select: SELECT G.id AS gachaId , G.status , G.title , G.manufacturer , G.file_id , F.file_url , G.price , G.view_count , G.created_at FROM GACHA G LEFT JOIN IMAGE_FILE F ON F.file_id = G.file_id WHERE G.id = #{gachaId}
SELECT id AS gachaItemId , name FROM GACHA_ITEM WHERE gacha_id = #{gachaId} ORDER BY created_at ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE GACHA SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE id = #{gachaId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GACHA_WISH WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND gacha_id = #{gachaId}
mapper.select: SELECT TI.id , TI.trade_id , TI.gacha_id , TI.type , TI.created_at , TI.updated_at , TI.sales_item_id , GI_S.name AS sales_item_name , TI.sales_count , TI.sales_current_count , TI.sales_price , TI.exchange_give_item_id , GI_E1.name AS exchange_give_item_name , TI.exchange_want_item_id , GI_E2.name AS exchange_want_item_name FROM TRADE_ITEM TI LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_S ON GI_S.id = TI.sales_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E1 ON GI_E1.id = TI.exchange_give_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E2 ON GI_E2.id = TI.exchange_want_item_id WHERE TI.trade_id = #{tradeId} AND TI.gacha_id = #{gachaId} ORDER BY TI.id ASC

SELECT id , gacha_id , user_id , type , status , title , content , file_id , hope_method , hope_location , hope_address , hope_location_latitude , hope_location_longitude , created_at , updated_at FROM TRADE WHERE id = #{tradeId} AND gacha_id = #{gachaId}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE_SUGGEST WHERE trade_id = #{tradeId} AND status = 'APPROVED'
SELECT F.file_url FROM IMAGE_FILE F INNER JOIN TRADE T ON T.file_id = F.file_id WHERE T.id = #{tradeId}
